content:
Hi Team,

While trying to hit the /dstu2/0b8a0111-e8e6-4c26-a91c-5069cbc6b1ca API, am getting the following error.

raise ConnectionError(e, request=request)
requests.exceptions.ConnectionError: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='fhir-open.sandbox
cerner.com', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /dstu2/0b8a0111-e8e6-4c26
-a91c-5069cbc6b1ca/Device?_id=15575768 (Caused by NewConnectionError('<urllib3.c
onnection.VerifiedHTTPSConnection object at 0x00000086DB8D5D48>: Failed to estab
lish a new connection: [WinError 10061] No connection could be made because the
target machine actively refused it'))

Thanks
